thread.title: Colonial League, EPC soccer championship updates for Oct. 22, 2015
thread.title_full: Colonial League, EPC soccer championship updates for Oct. 22, 2015

title: Colonial League, EPC soccer championship updates for Oct. 22, 2015
text:
View/Post Comments 
The Colonial League and Eastern Pennsylvania Conference girls and boys soccer championships will be decided Thursday night. 
At Northern Lehigh High School, it will be Northwestern against Southern Lehigh in the girls title game and Northwestern versus Moravian Academy in the boys championship. 
At Nazareth Area High School, the EPC girls title game features Parkland and Pleasant Valley and the boys championship will be Parkland and Pocono Mountain East . 
Josh Folck will be at the Colonial League championships and Greg Joyce is covering the EPC title games. 
Find updates in the comments section below.
